subject: Summer is coming, time to tone up
body:
I was born overweight and teased because of it most of my younger years. Finally at age 23 I took the initialtive and purchased a 4 month supply of Anatrim. I have since shed 31 pounds of unwanted weight and have a new enthusiasm for life! I go out more, socialize more, and have even met a special lady who I love. I credit much of my new-found happiness to the weight I lost and your product. Try IT
http://www.kinerew.net/?821jqltld
